00014 #ifndef DEBUG_CLOCK_H
00015 #define DEBUG_CLOCK_H
00016 
00017 #include "config.h"
00018 
00019 #include "TimeUtility.h"
00020 #include <iosfwd>
00021 
00023 class DebugClock {
00024 public:
00025    inline DebugClock() : m_startTime( TimeUtility::getCurrentTime() ) {}
00027    inline uint32 getTime() const {
00028       return TimeUtility::getCurrentTime() - m_startTime;
00029    }
00030 private:
00031    uint32 m_startTime;
00032 };
00033 
00035 class DebugClockMicro {
00036 public:
00037    DebugClockMicro(): m_startTime( TimeUtility::getCurrentMicroTime() ) { }
00039    uint32 getTime() const {
00040       return TimeUtility::getCurrentMicroTime() - m_startTime;
00041    }
00042 private:
00043    uint32 m_startTime;
00044 };
00045 
00047 class DebugClockSeconds {
00048 public:
00049    DebugClockSeconds(): m_startTime( TimeUtility::getRealTime() ) { }
00051    uint32 getTime() const {
00052       return TimeUtility::getRealTime() - m_startTime;
00053    }
00054 private:
00056    uint32 m_startTime;
00057 };
00058 
00060 inline ostream& operator<<( ostream& ost, const DebugClock& clock) {
00061    ost << clock.getTime() << " ms";
00062    return ost;
00063 }
00064 
00066 inline ostream& operator << ( ostream& ost, const DebugClockMicro& clock ) {
00067    ost << clock.getTime() << " us";
00068    return ost;
00069 }
00070 
00071 inline ostream& operator << ( ostream& ost, const DebugClockSeconds& clock ) {
00072    ost << clock.getTime() << " s";
00073    return ost;
00074 }
00075 
00076 #endif
